sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step"> <x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <applicaiton>ASAP</applicaiton> <assignment_group/> <detailed_description/> <expected_result>VERIFY: In Manage Orders Activity, under Order History / Review Tab, select order "nursing order to transfuse RBC" to view the transfused unit has a status of Completed.</expected_result> <number>TS0001492</number> <order>63</order> <prep_step>false</prep_step> <state>draft</state> <sys_created_by>RBUSCH</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-07-19 20:36:10</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7a88d9d7db9f5b0040f8fcfa0c9619fe</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>RBUSCH</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-07-19 20:36:10</sys_updated_on> <test>Complete the first unit of blood by clicking on the Complete Unit hyperlink that appears after the transfusion has stopped.</test> <test_script display_value="TES0001002">662811d7db9f5b0040f8fcfa0c9619be</test_script> <testing_user>EDRN</testing_user> </x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step> </record_update>
